text: Son was there on 20 Jan 2024 Sat morning around 7.30 am. He said the station only open at 8 am and was end up late as the needs to walk to YCK station. Wondering why the station open so late?  Can someone advice me. Thank you

Clean and spacious mrt station. The escalators are smooth too. Well maintained mrt station. It falls on brown line. The connectivity from this station and to the station is great. Bus stops are nearby.
Clean and spacious . Food is at Blk 108 . Use exit 5 and round the corner from the MRT. Lentor met has no eating place
Quiet and tranquil station, even in the middle of the day
This place will have a major change in 5 years time. looking for a property in this area ? call baron 9725 8119
